title: Boten Anna
lyric:
Hon röjer upp I våran kanal.
Jag vill berätta för dig att jag känner en bot.
Jag känner en bot
Hon heter Anna. Anna heter hon.

title: Wake Me Up
lyric:
Life's a game made for everyone.
And love is a prize.
So wake me up when it's all over.
When I'm wiser and I'm older

title: Dancing Queen
lyric: You're a teaser, you turn 'em on. Leave them burning and then you're gone. Looking out for another, anyone will do. You're in the mood for a dance.

title: All That She Wants
lyric:
It's not a day for work.
It's a day for catching tan.
Just laying on the beach and having fun.
She's going to get you.

title: The Look
lyric:
Walking like a man.
Hitting like a hammer.
She's a juvenile scam. Never was a quitter.
Tasty like a raindrop.

title: I Love It
lyric:
I threw you shit into a bag and pushed it down the stairs.
I crashed my car into the bridge.
I don't care! I love it, I don't care!

title: Never Forget You
lyric:
But sometimes you just gotta know that these things fall through.
I can't hide my connection with you.
I’ll never forget you.
And you’ll always be by my side

title: The Final Countdown
lyric: I guess there is no one to blame. We're leaving ground (leaving ground). Will things ever be the same again?
